answers.answer: Oops title shud say thirsty not thirty :-D

Are you a diabetic or at risk for it?  I am and when my blood sugars are high you can feel drained and too tired to do anything although that is anything so a pregnancy symptom.  Being thirsty with really no relief can also be a sign of diabetes...that is how I found out 7 years ago.  I would talk to your Dr and see what he thinks...it might be nothing.

question: Ill b 5 week's tomorrow & im soooooo thirsty all the time!! Its like my throat is so dry & my body feels drained like im dehydrated but my belly feels to full to drink anymore! Anyone else??!!
title: thirty. ..
